statements: SELECT * FROM energy_transactions_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT energy_provider, energy_amount FROM energy_transactions_history WHERE energy_amount > 100 ORDER BY energy_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_transactions_history WHERE energy_provider = 'Solar Energy Inc' AND energy_consumer = 'Green Energy Co';
SELECT energy_provider, energy_consumer, energy_amount FROM energy_transactions_history WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT energy_provider FROM energy_transactions_history ORDER BY energy_provider ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_transactions_history WHERE energy_provider = 'ABC Energy' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT energy_consumer, SUM(energy_amount) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_transactions_history GROUP BY energy_consumer ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT energy_provider, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM energy_transactions_history GROUP BY energy_provider ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_transactions_history WHERE energy_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_date;

SELECT energy_provider, energy_consumer, SUM(energy_amount) AS total_energy_transferred FROM energy_transactions_history GROUP BY energy_provider, energy_consumer ORDER BY total_energy_transferred DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, energy_source FROM energy_transactions WHERE energy_amount > 100;
SELECT client_id, transaction_date FROM energy_transactions WHERE energy_source = 'Solar';
SELECT * FROM energy_transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT history_id, current_energy_amount FROM energy_transaction_history WHERE previous_energy_amount < current_energy_amount;
SELECT * FROM energy_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, energy_amount ASC, transaction_id;
SELECT transaction_id, energy_source, energy_amount FROM energy_transactions WHERE energy_source = 'Solar';
SELECT client_id, COUNT(transaction_id) as transaction_count FROM energy_transactions GROUP BY client_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 2;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.energy_source, h.previous_energy_amount, h.current_energy_amount FROM energy_transactions t JOIN energy_transaction_history h ON t.transaction_id = h.transaction_id;
SELECT DISTINCT energy_source FROM energy_transactions;
SELECT * FROM energy_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, source, destination, energy_amount FROM energy_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_producers WHERE energy_type='Solar';
SELECT producer_id, producer_name FROM energy_producers WHERE location='California';
SELECT consumer_name, location, energy_usage FROM energy_consumers ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_transactions WHERE source='Solar Panel' AND energy_amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT timestamp, destination, energy_amount FROM energy_transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY energy_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, source, destination, energy_amount FROM energy_transactions WHERE destination LIKE '%City%' AND energy_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_producers WHERE location='California' AND energy_type='Wind' ORDER BY producer_name ASC;
SELECT consumer_name, location, energy_usage FROM energy_consumers WHERE energy_usage > 500 ORDER BY energy_usage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_transactions;
SELECT transaction_type, energy_amount, transaction_date FROM energy_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM energy_providers WHERE provider_location = 'New York';
SELECT consumer_name, consumer_location FROM energy_consumers WHERE consumer_location != 'California';
SELECT history_id, event_type, event_date FROM transaction_history ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, energy_amount FROM energy_transactions WHERE energy_amount > 100 AND transaction_type = 'Sale' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT et.transaction_id, et.transaction_type, ep.provider_name, ec.consumer_name FROM energy_transactions et JOIN energy_providers ep ON et.transaction_id = ep.provider_id JOIN energy_consumers ec ON et.transaction_id = ec.consumer_id;
SELECT th.history_id, th.event_type, th.event_date FROM transaction_history th JOIN energy_transactions et ON th.transaction_id = et.transaction_id WHERE et.transaction_type = 'Purchase';
SELECT et.transaction_id, SUM(et.energy_amount) AS total_energy_amount FROM energy_transactions et GROUP BY et.transaction_id HAVING total_energy_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumers;
SELECT consumer_id, consumer_name, address FROM EnergyProviders;
SELECT transaction_id, consumer_id, provider_id, transaction_date, energy_amount FROM EnergyTransactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT energy_amount, transaction_id FROM EnergyTransactions WHERE energy_amount > 100 ORDER BY energy_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyMeterReadings WHERE reading_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumers;
SELECT consumer_id, consumer_name, address FROM EnergyConsumers ORDER BY consumer_id DESC;
SELECT provider_name, address FROM EnergyProviders WHERE provider_id = 3;
SELECT transaction_id, energy_amount, transaction_date FROM EnergyTransactions WHERE energy_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, transaction_id, payment_date, amount_paid FROM EnergyPayments WHERE amount_paid < 500 ORDER BY payment_date;
